contents: He also found continued success with a string of romantic comedies co-starring Doris Day: Pillow Talk (1959), Lover Come Back (1961), and Send Me No Flowers (1964).
title: triviahg_train_13735

contents: He was an American actor, one of the most popular movie stars of his time.
title: triviahg_train_13735

contents: He achieved stardom with his role in Magnificent Obsession (1954), followed by All That Heaven Allows (1955), and Giant (1956).
title: triviahg_train_13735

contents: He received a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in Giant (1956).
title: triviahg_train_13735

contents: Unhappy with the film scripts he was offered, he turned to television and was a hit, starring in the popular mystery series McMillan & Wife (1971–1977).
